title: Former installation gallery: whole house!
posting_body: Whole two bedroom house, with driveway, one-car-garage, Washer and dryer, appliances near freeway and Waterloo Rd.
in North Collinwood is in the main drag of galleries, shops, Waterloo Arts, Beachland Ballroom Music venue, Citizen Pie Pizza and more!
In fact, this house was Satellite Installation Art Gallery for 3 years and then it morphed into The Church of Art!
It looks like a spaceship, with silver paint, round windows and a steeple on top!
The interior walls are covered with wild art painted directly on the walls.
It has a graffiti like feel for those who want to have unusual wild décor!
This house is not for the conservative run-of-mill renter.
It is for an artist or musician or actor or bohemian!
To see more photos of house when it was a gallery, go to Facebook, Satellite Gallery.
Include your phone number in your response to this listing!
Please put Cool House in subject of email.
